DuplicateJobMatchingRuleDefinition.name: DuplicateJobMatchingRuleDefinition
DuplicateJobMatchingRuleDefinition.description: Setup object specifying a MatchingRule to use with DuplicateJob instances that share a DuplicateJobDefinition.

DuplicateJobDefinitionId.description: ID of DuplicateJobDefinition (master) for this DuplicateJobMatchingRuleDefinition (detail).

MatchingRuleId.description: ID of the MatchingRule to be used with this DuplicateJobMatchingRuleDefinition.
